name: PokeDex For Unity
description:
This is a pokedex system one of our dev's built for unity note this can be used for any sort of information system like quest log or bestiary's easily it is set up with 2 pokemon so you can see how it works it is also set up for ease of use with an example scene so you can start using it right of the gate.

Also it uses the new unity UI system it can be configured to use the old ui system with ease.

Also the dev that made this is also available for some freelance work but only on the unity3D game engine or rpg maker code language preferred is C# email abnormalitydevelopment@gmail.com with the subject freelance and detail the job you need done and the price.

Features

*Works like a pokedex can work as easily as any info system like quest logs or bestiary.

*Lifetime support from the dev that made it just email pinkyssoft@outlook.com with the subject pokedex.

*You can have as many slots as you want the scrolling will automatically adjust for the size.

*Included is a small script also showing how to unlock an entry in to the dex.

*We also include the unity file it self and a zip file for your convenience.

how to add new dex/bestiary entries link below

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSK9YKh0WgQ&feature=youtu.be

also if you are new to code or the ui system for unity this will also help you with the learning of how certain things work together to give good results.

Notice

we do not work or represent the Nintendo or game-freak company we are simply creating our own version of a pokedex system for the unity3D/5 game engine we included pokemon sprites with the package but they are merely for showing purposes and is not included in the final price of the product, If a fan made pokemon game uses our system then we encourage you not to profit from it with out the proper permission from Nintendo and game freak how ever we do encourage non profit fan made games for training and learning purposes.
